import './App.css' import Axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import apiBasePath from './globalVars' function Login() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [input, setInput] = useState() const handleChange = event => { setInput(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getlogin/' + input) .then( res => { localStorage.setItem('personid', JSON.stringify(res.data.personid)) navigate('/') } ) .catch( err => console.log(err) ) } const demoMode = () => { localStorage.setItem('personid', JSON.stringify(-1)) navigate('/') } return ( <>

Albums of the Year

Login

) } export default Login
